explains: adj. 沉没的；凹陷的；比周围低的
v. 沉没（sink 的过去分词）；下沉

sentences.en: Her eyes were sunken and black-ringed.
sentences.cn: 她的双眼凹陷且有黑眼圈。

sentences.en: The sunken sail boat was a glimmer of white on the bottom.
sentences.cn: 这条沉没的帆船在海底呈一道白色微光。

sentences.en: This sighting occurred during my dive to a sunken wreck off Sardinia.
sentences.cn: 这次亲眼所见发生在我向撒丁岛外一艘沉船潜水的期间。
